title: Frank AlpenCoin
author: Frank AlpenCoin
content: 3 Days Auction for "Alpen Coin" 500,000 satoshi silver plated barLOT 1Alpen Coin 500,000 Satoshi Silver plated bar D197 loaded with 0,005 BTCSTARTING BID: 0.0050 BTCLOT 2Alpen Coin 500,000 Satoshi Silver plated bar D198 loaded with 0,005 BTCSTARTING BID: 0.0050 BTC STARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0050 BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0002 BTCBID FORMAT : LOT 1 : 0.0000 BTCEND TIME: SEPTEMBER 22th, 2023, 21:00 GENEVA TIMEPayment due in BTC within 24 hours of auction end. I will send the winner the payment addressSNIPE PER LOT: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.SHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceEscrow allowed, winner pays fees.Thank you
